content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 18 Apr 2018How/Where do I check the dividend yield for STI ETF? Let’s say if I’m planning on Lump Sum Investing ie. $5000?2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Yeap Ming FengLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 18 Apr 2018For Dividend Yield for STI ETF, one can head over to the the SGX website, under ETFs, look for STI ETF and checkout the corporate action.Here's the link: http://www.sgx.com/wps/portal/sgxweb/home/marketinfo/securities/etfsAlso, here are some articles to help you out with your understanding of the STI ETF:
https://blog.seedly.sg/how-to-sti-etf-a-simple-way-to-invest-in-singapores-top-30-companies/0 comments1

Kenneth Lou, Co-founder at SeedlyLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 02 Nov 2018Hey friend! You can check for the dividend yield for the STI ETF via this link here: http://www.sgx.com/wps/portal/sgxweb/home/marketinfo/securities/etfs 0 comments0
